tests.name: `PNG_open` fails on an invalid filename
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_open` fails on an invalid filename'

tests.name: `PNG_open` validates a valid PNG signature
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_open` validates a valid PNG signature'

tests.name: `PNG_open` fails a non-PNG signature file
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_open` fails a non-PNG signature file'

tests.name: `PNG_read` returns PNG file chunks correctly
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_read` returns PNG file chunks correctly'

tests.name: `PNG_write` writes a PNG chunk and CRC
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_write` writes a PNG chunk and CRC'

tests.name: `PNG_write` writes a PNG chunk with correct endianness
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_write` writes a PNG chunk with correct endianness'
